properties.entry: SELECT USER_NO, TEAM_NO, USER_ID, USER_EMAIL, USER_NAME, USER_PHONE, USER_SNS, USER_BD, USER_ADDRESS, USER_GENDER , USER_NATION , USER_IMG_ORIGIN, USER_IMG_RENAME, USER_AUTHORITY, USER_ST, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MM:SS') AS CREATE_DT, TO_CHAR(DELETE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MM:SS') AS DELETE_DT FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PW = ? AND DELETE_DT IS NULL
UPDATE USER_SESSION SET SESSION_UUID = ? WHERE USER_NO = ?
SELECT USER_ID, USER_PW FROM USER_INFO U JOIN USER_SESSION S ON (U.USER_NO = S.USER_NO) WHERE S.SESSION_UUID = ?
